DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety efficacy celecoxib versus sodium diclofenac subject acute low back pain
DOC.brief_title: Safety And Efficacy Of Celecoxib Versus Sodium Diclofenac In The Treatment Of Acute Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Aged 18 65 year Acute low back pain fall 1st 2nd class 'Quebec Task Force ' classification moderate severe intensity ( > 50 mm VAS ) Acute low back pain onset < 72 hour prior study inclusion > 6 week last acute low back pain episode Exclusion criterion : Scoliosis know history inflammatory arthritis , chronic pain , metastasis , Paget 's disease , disease cause pain Low back pain major trauma visceral disorder Esophageal ulcer , gastric duodenal ulcer bleed within 30 day prior administer study drug
